Target Title: TA1.9: The contribution of the sectors covered by the EU ETS with respect to the EU Climate ambition should be of -62 % compared to 2005
Justification: The EU ETS primarily covers energy generation and waste management sectors, focusing on emissions.

Target Title: TA1.12: Achieve an EU net greenhouse gas removal of 310 million tonnes CO2 equivalent per year for the land use, land use change and forestry (LULUCF) sector
Justification: This target involves forest management and land use, falling under agriculture and forestry.

Target Title: TA2.6: Energy demand to be covered by solar heat and geothermal should at least triple
Justification: This target is related to renewable energy generation, particularly solar and geothermal energy.

Target Title: TA2.27: Indicative national targets aiming to achieve the deep renovation of at least 35 million building units by 2030
Justification: The target focuses on building construction and renovation, involving construction and specialized activities.

Target Title: TA3.4: By 2030 textile products placed on the EU market are long-lived and recyclable
Justification: The focus is on sustainable textile manufacturing and recycling processes.

Target Title: TA3.33: Recycling of wood in packaging,30%
Justification: This involves wood product manufacturing and waste recycling activities.

Target Title: TA4.16: From 1 January 2020, this Regulation sets an EU fleet-wide target of 95 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new passenger cars
Justification: The target pertains to the automotive manufacturing sector, especially motor vehicles.

Target Title: TA4.28: by 31 December 2030, in each safe and secure parking area at least four publicly accessible recharging stations
Justification: This relates to transportation infrastructure, specifically support activities for transportation.

Target Title: TA5.26: Strengthen educational messages on the importance of healthy nutrition, sustainable food production and consumption
Justification: This target pertains to educational activities focusing on health and sustainability.

Target Title: TA5.35: Strengthen the resilience of the EU food system. Build up resilience to possible future diseases and pandemics
Justification: This involves agriculture and food manufacturing sectors to enhance sustainability and resilience.
Without specific content, this might involve professional and consultancy activities related to environmental impact.

Target Title: TA7.12: Develop measures to significantly increase efforts to identify, investigate, assess and remediate contaminated sites
Justification: This target focuses on remediation services and waste management activities.
